meanings.definition: To make an attack in response to a previous attack.
meanings.sent1: After the opponent struck, the team started counterattacking swiftly.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers were counterattacking the enemy forces with determination.
meanings.sent3: The ninja turtles were counterattacking the evil robots in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The waves counterattacked the shore relentlessly, never giving up.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's counterattacking moves were as quick as lightning.

meanings.definition: The act of launching an attack in response to an enemy's attack.
meanings.sent1: The counterattacking of the enemy caught them off guard.
meanings.sent2: The general's strategy involved swift counterattacking.
meanings.sent3: The counterattacking of the squirrels against the birds was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The counterattacking of ideas in the meeting room was intense.
meanings.sent5: The counterattacking of the chess pieces on the board was strategic.
